name: Gnoll
description: Gnolls are humanoid creatures with canine features, including fur and sharp teeth. They are fierce hunters, often operating in packs, which has largely shaped their society around smaller tribes rather than large settlements. Loyalty and family are core values in Gnoll societies, and their culture revolves around the Eternal Hunt - a notion that their hunger and thirst for danger and glory is never satisfied.

options.name: Large
options.description: Gnolls are large creatures. All of your physique skills are upgraded and your finesse skills downgraded. Additionally, you take up a 2x2 unit area.

options.name: Gnoll Honor Bond
options.description: You make an unbreakable bond with another Humanoid, allowing them to use your Resilience Modifier when making Resilience Checks. This bond ends upon the death of either Creature.

options.name: Action : Gnoll Bite
options.description: You make a modified unarmed attack against a creature with a bonus dice, dealing 3 physical damage for the primary dice and any extra dice that hit. If this attack deals 6 or more damage after calculating mitigation, the target gains the bleeding condition.

options.name: Primitive
options.description: Your logic, academics knowledge and magic knowledge skills are downgraded. Additionally, you can only learn languages at a basic level.
